_comment: entities define all possible node types in the data. Attributes need to be defined
_attributes: The value type of attributes must be a valid 'entity' or 'literal'
_back_links: We can define the name of the backlink attribute as the second element in the attribute list. For example: person:'studied at' is of type 'college', the backlink 'alumni' will be generated from 'college' to 'person'
_templates: For repeating fields, use a template. Define it separtely in 'templates' dict
_note_templates: Backlinks are not supported currently in templates.
